籤詩版本二:
Ndakawana pfuma muhope dzangu ndichibva ndapepuka ndisina chandaiziva.Ndaifunga kuti Nanshan raingova badza.
Kana ukabvunza nezvewanano nehurwere, usatsvage nzira dzekutsigirana.
詩意:
Iyi hexagram inomiririra chiratidzo chekuwana pfuma muchiroto.
Zvose hazvina maturo.
解曰: Zvinhu zviri mumvura. Chimiro uye mumvuri kureba. Zvose zvakatsunga. Hapana chikonzero chekukurukura.
籤詩故事一:
◇Ma Chao anodzinga Cao
Ma Chao (176-222), zita rekuremekedza Mengqi, aive chizvarwa chekuFufeng Maoling (ikozvino kuchamhembe kwakadziva kumabvazuva kweXingping, mudunhu reShaanxi). Aive mukuru ane mukurumbira weHumambo hweShu Han mukupera kwaHan Dynasty uye nguva yeHumambo Hutatu.
Munguva yeHumambo Hutatu, Cao Cao akauraya baba vaMa Chao. Ma Chao akatsiva uye akarwisa Cao Cao, asi Cao Cao akakundwa ndokutiza.
Kuti arege kuzivikanwa nemauto aMa Chao, Cao Cao akakumura hembe yake tsvuku, ndokugera ndebvu dzake pfupi, ndokutiza akatasva bhiza.
Munguva yakaoma, Cao Hong akasvika nemauto ake nenguva, akamisa Ma Chao, uye akaponesa hupenyu hwaCao Cao kubva kugedhi regehena.
(Nyaya iyi idimikira rekuti munhu angatiza sei kubva munjodzi nekusiya mukurumbira nechimiro chake.)
聖意: Kana musha wenyu usina kumira zvakanaka chenjerai kutsvaga mari,kutadzisa matransaction kana kuroora kana kuroorwa ndinokumbirawo makomborero kune vanofamba netsoka.Makonye esirika akamira muminda zvipfuyo zvitanhatu zvakamira kutsvaga vanhu matare edzimhosva.kurasikirwa. Kutama rombo rakanaka, pfuma yakarasika. Zvirwere zvisina maturo namatira dziviriro yaMwari makomo nemakuva hazvina kugadzikana.
